com.krobothsoftware.commons.network

Class NetworkHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.krobothsoftware.commons.network.NetworkHelper

  • public class NetworkHelper
extends Object
    Small client for helping connections.
    Since:
    SNC 1.0
    See Also:
    HttpURLConnection, RequestBuilder

    • Field Summary

      Main logger for sending connections.

 NetworkHelper/1.0.0 (Windows 7 6.1; Java 1.7.0_17)

        Since:
        SNC 1.0

        public static final ConnectionListener NULL_CONNECTION_LISTENER
        Null Connection Listener. Use this instead of null when setting listener.
        Since:
        SNC 1.0

        protected CookieManager cookieManager
        Cookie manager for connections. New manager can be set with setCookieManager(CookieManager).

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets values. Only Timeouts, max redirects, headers, and proxy.
        Since:

      • setupHeaders

        protected void setupHeaders()
        Sets default headers. 
         
        
 
        
 User Agent
 NetworkHelper.AGENT_DEFAULT
 
        
 
        
 Accept
 text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8
 
        
 
        
 Accept-Encoding
 gzip, deflate
 
        
 
        
 Accept-Charset
 UTF-8
        Since:
        SNC 1.0

      • setProxy

        public void setProxy(Proxy proxy)
        Sets the proxy used for opening connections. Default is Proxy.NO_PROXY.
        Parameters:
        proxy - the new proxy
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if proxy is null
        Since:
        SNC 1.0
        See Also:
        openConnection(URL)

      • setHeader

        public void setHeader(String name,
             String value)
        Sets default header for connections. If the RequestBuilder has the same header, the default one will not be used.
        Parameters:
        name - header name
        value - header value, or null to remove
        Since:
        SNC 1.0
        See Also:
        RequestBuilder

      • setConnectTimeout

        public void setConnectTimeout(int connectTimeout)
        Sets default connect timeout for connections. If the RequestBuilder already has a connect timeout set, the default one will not be used.
        Parameters:
        connectTimeout - new default connect timout
        Since:
        SNC 1.0
        See Also:
        RequestBuilder

      • setReadTimeout

        public void setReadTimeout(int readTimeout)
        Sets default read timeout for connections. If the RequestBuilder already has a connect read set, the default one will not be used.
        Parameters:
        readTimeout - new default read timeout
        Since:
        SNC 1.0
        See Also:
        RequestBuilder

      • setMaxRedirects

        public void setMaxRedirects(int redirects)
        Sets max re-directs for connections. Used on RequestBuilder.followRedirects(boolean) option. Default is from property http.maxRedirects or 20.
        Parameters:
        redirects - new max re-directs
        Since:
        SNC 1.0
        See Also:
        RequestBuilder

      • setConnectionListener

        public void setConnectionListener(ConnectionListener connectionListener)
        Sets ConnectionListener for all RequestBuilder s.
        Parameters:
        connectionListener -
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if listener is null
        Since:
        SNC 1.0
        See Also:
        RequestBuilder, NULL_CONNECTION_LISTENER

                                 throws IOException
        Opens connection and sets proxy from NetworkHelper.
        Parameters:

      • openConnection

        public HttpURLConnection openConnection(URL url,
                               Proxy proxy)
                                 throws IOException
        Opens connection with proxy.
        Parameters:
        url - url for connection
        proxy - proxy for connection, can't be null
        Returns:
        HttpURLConnection
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        Since:
        SNC 1.0

      • getPairs

        public static List<NameValuePair> getPairs(String... nameValue)
        Helper method for building a NameValuePair list. Every two elements in the nameValue array adds a new NameValuePair.
        Parameters:
        nameValue - array of names and values.
        Returns:
        constructed list of pairs
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if there are an odd number of elements
        Since:
        SNC 1.0

              List<NameValuePair> query)
                       throws UnsupportedEncodingException
        Helper method for setting query part of URL.
        Parameters:
        url -
        query - list of NameValuePair
        Returns:
        modified URL with query
        Throws:
        UnsupportedEncodingException - if charset isn't found
        Since:
        SNC 1.0

      • getQueryList

        public static List<NameValuePair> getQueryList(String query)

        Parameters:
        query - query part
        Returns:
        query params
        Since:
        SNC 1.0

      • getCharset

        public static String getCharset(HttpURLConnection connection)
        Gets the charset from urlConnection. If none found, will return the default UTF-8.
        Parameters:
        connection - connection
        Returns:
        charset found charset or UTF-8
        Since:
        SNC 1.0

      • getInputStream

        public static InputStream getInputStream(HttpURLConnection connection)
                                  throws IOException
        Gets the correct InputStream based on urlConnection encoding.
        Parameters:
        connection - connection
        Returns:
        inputstream from encoding. If not supported returns normal
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred. InputStream
        Since:
        SNC 1.0

      • getErrorStream

        public static InputStream getErrorStream(HttpURLConnection connection)
                                  throws IOException
        Gets the correct ErrorInputStream based on urlConnection encoding.
        Parameters:
        connection - connection
        Returns:
        errorstream from encoding. If not supported returns normal
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred. InputStream
        Since:
        SNC 1.0
